title: Citi Recognized by Dow Jones Sustainability Index for 16th Consecutive Year
summary: New York - Citi has been named to the Dow Jones Sustainability World and Dow Jones Sustainability North America indices (DJSI) for the 16th consecutive year. DJSI is the longest-running global sustainability benchmark and includes the world's leading sustainable companies based on an assessment of a wide range of economic, environmental, social and governance factors. Citi's inclusion in the DJSI is recognition of our continuing leadership in advancing economic, environmental and social progress around the world.
